content: Hello! I'm doing a talk next week at Codebeam America on WebAssembly and Elixir/Erlang. One of the things I'd really like to talk about is the component model and the new ecosystem that is likely to form (is forming?) around it. I'm trying to come up with a great example to show to make things more concrete for my audience. Any recommendations? Preferable something existing I can borrow (with proper attribution of course!)?
Hi Chris! We maintain documentation for the component model, which I hope should be a good starting point for this
